nodes.text: A Mandalorian was part of the Death Watch terrorist organization and was stationed in a camp on the snow-covered planet of Carlac around 21 BBY.

After junior senator Lux Bonteri arrived on the planet of Carlac along with Padawan Ahsoka Tano and astromech droid R2-D2 to deliver a holotrace device with the location of Separatist leader Count Dooku to the Mandalorian terrorist organization known as the Death Watch, the three were lead by the Mandalorians into their campsite.

This soldier was later seen in the evening, going inside the tent where the captive Ming Po females were held and ordering them to prepare the food. The next morning, the Death Watch members, including this soldier, attacked the Ming Po town, forcing Ahsoka Tano to reveal her true identity and was eventually captured by the Mandalorians. Facing execution, Ahsoka was saved by R2-D2, who sent the repaired junk droids to fight the Death Watch and allowed Lux and Ahsoka enough time to escape.
